abstract: Associated Press' declaration that Hillary Clinton was presumptive Democratic presidential nominee caused ripple effect in newsrooms nationwide, as pollsters hastened to confirm AP's arithmetic; media world has long regarded news agency as arbiter of election results.
lead_paragraph: The A.P.’s declaration, based on its canvassing of superdelegates, was an unusual way to crown the nation’s first major female presidential nominee.

headline.main: Early Nomination Call for Hillary Clinton by Associated Press Sent Media Scrambling
headline.print_headline: Early Nomination Call for Clinton by Associated Press Sent Media Scrambling

snippet: The A.P.’s declaration, based on its canvassing of superdelegates, was an unusual way to crown the nation’s first major female presidential nominee....
